Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $8000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at $12000. I understand that every purchase is significant, and we're confident that this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, efficiency, and satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's any way we can make this offer more appealing to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
